definitions: an electronic document in which data is arranged in the rows and columns of a grid and can be manipulated and used in calculations

examples.text: we have a color-coded Excel spreadsheet of all of our trip expenses
William spent most of the day updating the Risk Assessment spreadsheet

shortDefinitions: document in which data is arranged in rows and columns

definitions: a computer program used to create and manipulate spreadsheets.
shortDefinitions: computer program used to create and manipulate spreadsheets
